Class Prescription

java.lang.Object
Prescription
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Prescription extends Object implements Serializable
Tracks medication details, quantity, and dispensing status Implements Serializable for persistent storage
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Prescription

      public Prescription(String appointmentId, String medication, int quantity)
      Constructs a new Prescription with the specified details (initial status is pending)
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the associated appointment
      medication - The name of the prescribed medication
      quantity - The quantity of medication prescribed

  • Method Details

    • deserialize

      protected static Map<String,ArrayList<Prescription>> deserialize()
      Deserializes prescriptions from a file.
      Returns:
      Map of appointment IDs to their list of prescriptions, or null if deserialization fails

    • serialize

      protected static boolean serialize(Map<String,ArrayList<Prescription>> allPrescriptions)
      Serializes prescriptions to a file.
      Parameters:
      allPrescriptions - Map of prescriptions to serialize
      Returns:
      true if serialization is successful, false otherwise

    • createPrescription

      public static Prescription createPrescription(String appointmentId, String medication, int quantity)
      Creates a new prescription for a specific appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the associated appointment
      medication - The name of the medication to prescribe
      quantity - The quantity of medication to prescribe
      Returns:
      A new Prescription instance

    • dispensePrescription

      public void dispensePrescription()
      Marks the prescription as dispensed by changing its status to DISPENSED.

      public void print()
      Prints the details of the prescription to the console.
